task_summary: Grasp the lid on the pot and lift it upward to open the pot.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator must open a pot by lifting its metal lid. The scene shows a pot with a lid on a box-like base placed on a table. The robot should visually locate the lid, prepare the gripper, compute a top grasp on the knob/handle, align, grasp, and then lift vertically to clear the pot. Safety and contact stability are important to avoid sliding the lid or colliding with the pot rim. The task ends once the lid is clearly lifted off and the robot retreats slightly.
preconditions: Workspace is clear around the pot
Pot and lid are within reachable workspace
Camera provides view of the lid
stepwise_plan: Open gripper to a suitable width
Compute a top grasp pose on the lid
Approach and align to the grasp pose with tight tolerance
success_criteria: No visible collision with pot rim
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails, re-run detection or adjust view
If alignment times out, retry approach
If grasp is unstable, reopen and recompute grasp
If lift meets resistance, lower and retry alignment
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when lid is grasped and lifted by the target distance with stable hold, followed by a short retreat and wait.

frame_3.now_evidence: Arm aligned near the lid, indicating precise approach to grasp.
frame_3.predicts_next: Successful grasp followed by vertical lift.

task_instruction: lift up a lid from the pot

node_specs.description: Perceive the lid and ensure it is visible.
Prepare gripper for top grasp on lid knob.
Compute top grasp pose for the lid.
Approach and align to grasp pose with tight tolerance.
Close gripper to grasp the lid.
Lift lid vertically to clear the pot.
Back off from the pot after lifting.

recovery_strategy: Open gripper and retry with top strategy
Perform small retreat and repeat lift
assumptions: Lid has a top knob suitable for a top grasp
Frames suggest vertical lift is feasible; no hinge is present
Task ends after lift and retreat without placing the lid elsewhere
